knimeNode.name: Decision Tree Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Uses an existing decision tree to compute class labels for input vectors.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses an existing decision tree (passed in through the model port) to predict the class value for new patterns. The Node can be configured as follows:
fullDescription.option: Determines the maximum number of patterns the tree will store to support HiLiting.

option.name: Append columns with normalized class distribution

fullDescription.option: Shows the normalized class distribution for each prediction.

ports.inPort: A previously learned decision tree model
ports.outPort: The input table with one column added containing the classification

views.view: The decision tree as given in the model port along with the classified data.
The decision tree as given in the model port along with the classified data. The tree can be expanded and collapsed with the plus/minus signs.
